price: 41 Ecoute attentivement l’appel que lancera l’ange[1316] d’un lieu tout proche,
arabic: وَٱسۡتَمِعۡ يَوۡمَ يُنَادِ ٱلۡمُنَادِ مِن مَّكَانٖ قَرِيبٖ
footnotes: [1316] Chargé de souffler dans la Corne, annonce du Jugement dernier.

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: wa-is'tamiʿ yawma yunādi al-munādi min makānin qarībin
